<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui_activity_formatter" name="Activity formatter" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="Activity_Formatter_Plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow">
<description>Quickly and easily filter the list of activities, or history, on a task form</description>
<extension point="com.glide.css" name="styles/activity.css" />
</plugin>
]]></definition> <description>Quickly and easily filter the list of activities, or history, on a task form</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Activity_Formatter_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.ui_activity_formatter</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Activity formatter</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui_activity_formatter/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui_activity_formatter</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
